name: DaystillHalloween
0:
”Alexa, open days till halloween”
”Alexa, start days till halloween”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: days till halloween
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until Halloween along with a funny comment to get you ready for the spooktacular day.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
